ValidationRule.description: Customer_Reason_change to be mandatory on change in Customer Due Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(And(ISCHANGED( Customer_Due_Date__c ),not( ISCHANGED( Customer_Reason_Change__c ) ),TEXT( Customer_Reason_Change__c ) = 'Original'), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a reason for changing Customer Due Date
